typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movies as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as string,
		Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
